section.p: You close with the pirate vessel. At close quarters you see the attackers waiting with drawn swords at the rail. They are an odd mix of tall Uttakin, velvet-coated Golnirans, Sokarans with broad pale faces and savage natives of the Feathered Lands. All are alike in one respect, however: the naked hate that shines from their eyes. As the ships come together, they leap aboard with a wild battle-cry.

outcomes.outcome: Forced to give in; lose 1-6 Stamina
